text: Doris Trueman (born 23 May 1953) is a British cross-country skier. She competed in three events at the 1984 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:British female cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Great Britain Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Aberdeen
title: Doris Trueman
